Valley Trader Kitzka:
The Sealed Blood Crystal is Anthara's crystallized spilled blood. It has lost the original magic power of Antharas's blood, but if you combine it with Will of Antharas, you can obtain an item with tremendous magic power. If you use it, you can resurrect numerous people simultanously. This Sealed Blood Crystal can be obtained bu hunting the Emerald Horn, Dust Rider, Blood Fly, Black Dagger Wing, Shadow Summoner, Spike Slasher, and Muscle Bomber that can be summoned from the Dragon Vortex in Dragon Valley.
